verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> coming <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> with a <S%G3507>cloud<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2463>rainbow<s%> was <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> was <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4769>pillars<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> a little <S%G974>book<s%> <S%G455>open<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G5087>set<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> his <S%G2176>left<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2896>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G5618>as<s%> a <S%G3023>lion<s%> <S%G3455>roareth<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he <S%G2896>cried<s%>, the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1027>thunders<s%> <S%G2980>uttered<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1027>thunders<s%> <S%G2980>uttered<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%>, I was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G3427><s%> Seal <S%G4972>up<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1027>thunders<s%> <S%G2980>uttered<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G5023>them<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> lifted <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> right <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3660>sware<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> him that <S%G2198>liveth<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the things that <S%G846>are<s%> <S%G1722>therein<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the things that <S%G846>are<s%> <S%G1722>therein<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the things that <S%G846>are<s%> <S%G1722>therein<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> there shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G5550>delay<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2089>longer<s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%>, <S%G3752>when<s%> he is <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G4537>sound<s%>, <S%G2532>then<s%> is <S%G5055>finished<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G5613>according<s%> to the good tidings which he <S%G2097>declared<s%> to <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, I heard it <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G5217>Go<s%>, <S%G2983>take<s%> the <S%G974>book<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G455>open<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2476>standeth<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> that he should <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> the little <S%G974>book<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G2983>Take<s%> <S%G2532>it<s%>, and <S%G2719>eat<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G2719>up<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it shall <S%G4087>make<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2836>belly<s%> <S%G4087>bitter<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> it shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1099>sweet<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3192>honey<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G2983>took<s%> the little <S%G974>book<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G32>angel<s%>'s <S%G5495>hand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2719>ate<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G2719>up<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1099>sweet<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3192>honey<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> I had <S%G5315>eaten<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2836>belly<s%> was made <S%G4087>bitter<s%>.
